faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return unused items in their original packaging within 30 days for a refund or exchange. Contact support for assistance.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Track your order using the link provided in your confirmation email, or log into your account to view tracking details.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by location, and customs duties may apply for some countries.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay, ensuring secure payment options for all customers.

faqs.question: What if I receive a damaged item?
faqs.answer: Please contact-us our support team within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damaged item. Weâll arrange a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or change my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel or change your order within 24 hours of placing it. Contact customer support to make updates.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide special discounts for bulk orders. Contact our sales team with your requirements for a customized quote.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping usually takes 3-7 business days domestically and 7-14 business days internationally, depending on your location and selected shipping method.

faqs.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
faqs.answer: Many of our products are made with sustainable materials and eco-friendly practices to reduce environmental impact while maintaining quality.

faqs.question: How can I contact-us customer support?
faqs.answer: Reach out via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567 for assistance with any inquiries.
